title: Levi's Men's 502 Regular Taper Fit
description: CLASSIC SILHOUETTE WITH MODERN COMFORT: The Levi's 502 Regular Taper Fit jeans offer a timeless design with a contemporary twist, ensuring they become an instant favorite in your wardrobe. Sitting comfortably below the waist, these men’s jeans provide extra room in the thigh and a subtle tapering at the leg, creating a versatile silhouette that’s perfect for any occasion. The combination of classic style and modern fit makes these jeans a must-have for fashion-forward individuals.

ELEVATED STRETCH TECHNOLOGY: For those washes notated with Levi's Flex, these jeans are crafted with advanced stretch technology that delivers maximum flex and optimum comfort. Whether you're sitting, standing, or moving throughout your day, the enhanced stretch ensures a perfect fit and unparalleled comfort, making these stylish jeans ideal for everyday wear.

SIGNATURE DETAILS: The Levi's 502 jeans are adorned with iconic details that signify quality and craftsmanship. The signature arcuate stitch on the back pockets adds a touch of classic Levi’s style, while the belt loop waistband with a leather brand patch at the back waist adds durability and a premium look. The zipper fly closure in these versatile jeans ensures a secure and easy fit.

VERSATILE FABRIC COMPOSITION: Depending on the wash, the fabric composition of these stretchable jeans varies to provide the best blend of comfort and durability. From 100% cotton to blends of cotton, polyester, and elastane, each variation offers unique benefits. For example, the Panda Levi's Flex wash combines 81.5% cotton, 17% polyester, and 1.5% elastane, offering a balance of softness, flexibility, and strength.

IDEAL FIT FOR EVERYDAY WEAR: With precise measurements taken using size 32, inseam 32, these comfortable jeans are designed to fit comfortably and stylishly. Featuring a waist measurement of 32 inches, an outseam of 41 inches, an inseam of 31 inches, a front rise of 10 3⁄4 inches, a back rise of 15 inches, and a leg opening of 14 1⁄2 inches, these jeans offer a tailored fit that enhances your silhouette.

A classic taper for every day. Made with extra room for comfort. A refined, modern alternative to straight jeans. Made with + Warm Technology: Insulated fibers woven into every inch keep you warm when it's cold.
